name: Muppets Party Cruise
description: Muppets Party Cruise is a party video game released in 2003 by Mass Media Inc.. Players have the choice between a "short cruise" and a "long cruise". In the "short cruise" players simply select a minigame to play. In the "long cruise", players are characters on a board-game style board and must try to collect "party favours". Party Favours/coins are awarded for each minigame won.
